title: Levelling account - need some friends :)
body:
Hey guys, i am A Kind Guy and i'm feeling a little lonely levelling my account. I'm currently level 18, if any new players or smurfs want to add me to play whilst we level drop your IGN below 

my IGN - A Kind Guy

replies.body: I wouldn't mind having another friend for league :3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
